metadata.title: CVE-2017-9115 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In OpenEXR 2.2.0, an invalid write of size 2 in the = operator function inhalf.h could cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.1
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.1').
